title: Add AgentState to TUI Model struct
description: Add *agent.AgentState field to Model struct to hold live streaming state during runs. This replaces the simple 'output string' field for active runs. Keep 'output' for backward compatibility during transition.
closed_reason: Added *agent.AgentState field to TUI Model struct in internal/tui/model.go. Added import for github.com/pengelbrecht/ticker/internal/agent package. Kept existing 'output' field with comment noting it's for backward compatibility during transition. The new agentState field will hold live streaming state for rich display of thinking, output, tool activity, and metrics.
